actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate the Spanish Peaks Wilderness, Gallatin National Forest, in the State of Montana.

summary.text: Provides that the Spanish Peaks Primitive area be designated as the "spanish Peaks Wilderness" within and as a part of the Gallatin National Forest in the State of Montana to be administered by the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Spanish Peaks Wilderness, Gallatin National Forest, in the State of Montana.
